remarks: All simple paths of length 2 as ordered triple from a fixed vertex to another vertex are disjunct.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 4-Mar-2018.)
statement:
2spotdisj $p |- ( ( ( V e. X /\ E e. Y ) /\ A e. V ) -> Disj_ b e. ( V \ { A } ) ( A ( V 2SPathOnOt E ) b ) ) $.
$d A b $.
$d E b $.
$d V b $.
$d X b $.
$d Y b $.
